ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isfusgraclALT.v | |- V = ( 1st ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_1st2nd2 | |- ( G e. ( W X. X ) -> G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-br | |- ( ( 1st ` G ) FinUSGrph ( 2nd ` G ) <-> <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. e. FinUSGrph ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 1st ` G ) e. _V |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 2nd ` G ) e. _V |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( ( 1st ` G ) e. _V /\ ( 2nd ` G ) e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_isfusgra0 | |- ( ( ( 1st ` G ) e. _V /\ ( 2nd ` G ) e. _V ) -> ( ( 1st ` G ) FinUSGrph ( 2nd ` G ) <-> ( ( 1st ` G ) USGrph ( 2nd ` G ) /\ ( 1st ` G ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mp1i | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> ( ( 1st ` G ) FinUSGrph ( 2nd ` G ) <-> ( ( 1st ` G ) USGrph ( 2nd ` G ) /\ ( 1st ` G ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_syl5bbr | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> ( <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. e. FinUSGrph <-> ( ( 1st ` G ) USGrph ( 2nd ` G ) /\ ( 1st ` G ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> ( G e. FinUSGrph <-> <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. e. FinUSGrph ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> ( G e. USGrph <-> <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. e. USGrph ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_df-br | |- ( ( 1st ` G ) USGrph ( 2nd ` G ) <-> <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. e. USGrph ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl6bbr | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> ( G e. USGrph <-> ( 1st ` G ) USGrph ( 2nd ` G ) ) ) |
| 14 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> V = ( 1st ` G ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> ( V e. Fin <-> ( 1st ` G ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> ( ( G e. USGrph /\ V e. Fin ) <-> ( ( 1st ` G ) USGrph ( 2nd ` G ) /\ ( 1st ` G ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 17 | 9, 10, 16 | #P_3bitr4d | |- ( G = <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. -> ( G e. FinUSGrph <-> ( G e. USGrph /\ V e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 18 | 2, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. ( W X. X ) -> ( G e. FinUSGrph <-> ( G e. USGrph /\ V e. Fin ) ) ) |
